name: VargaVinter
description:
You’re carrying your child while travelling through the snowy woods. The leaves have turned bronze and the air smells like metal.

Try to keep warm while fending off hunger and strange creatures, but most of all don’t listen to the whispers.

 

A top down survival game with multiple endings!
Controls
